version.description1: Config version number used for auto_regen_outdated.

auto_regen_outdated.description: Should this file automatically regenerate whenever the default options are changed?

enabled.description1: Should Things spawn like vanilla mobs?
enabled.description2: Not recommended for the intended experience.

first_spawning_day.description1: The first day that Things can start spawning naturally.
first_spawning_day.description2: This option treats the first day in a world as day 1, unlike the vanilla F3 screen.

failure_chance.description1: The chance for a Thing to fail to spawn even when all the criteria are met.
failure_chance.description2: Can be used to make Things spawn less than vanilla spawn weight values allow, which is useful considering they do not despawn
